mapper.insert: insert into test.mem_tbl(memID, memPASSWORD, memNAME, memAGE, memGENDER, memEMAIL, memPROFILE) values (#{memID}, #{memPASSWORD}, #{memNAME}, #{memAGE}, #{memGENDER}, #{memEMAIL}, #{memPROFILE})
mapper.select: select * from test.mem_tbl where memID=#{memID} and memPASSWORD=#{memPASSWORD}
